snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items Friday's selection includes a look at Apple putting aside differences with Facebook and how the two sides in the piracy debate are talking past...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items Friday's selection includes a look at Apple putting aside differences with Facebook and how the two sides in the piracy debate are talking past each other.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Piracy Negotiations and Apple's Smart Move
